1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén</e> <pb/><t>A yet ayin oc yin somc'ulal, max wawtej Jehová, axa Cham max quin is tak'wej.</t>
2: <t>Mamin, colin el bay k'anej man yelok chi yal eb win, c'al bay eb naom aj k'anej.</t>
3: <pb/><t>¿Tzet yailal ok e yi' yuj e naom aj k'anejal tu'?</t>
4: <t>A ton julbalej lupupi txam yet eb ak'om owal, c'al tzak'ak'il te tzicap tol cakxayinak.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Ok'bal in c'ul, ec'jabwom anima in yul makbej Mesec, tol max in ayji ec' xol eb cajyom bay Cedar.</t>
6: <t>Najatilxa wec' cajan xol eb c'am chi yochej junc'ulal.</t>
7: <t>A yet chi walon el k'anejal yet junc'ulal xol eb, axa eb xin, a owal chi yochej eb.</t>
